channel.title: Help to change a place
channel.description: i have forgotten how to change the pk and home place to a different location i have the corrds....but i forget which file it is in and what do i search for. any help will be appricated :confused:

item.title: Help to change a place
item.dc:creator: @slomifier slomifier
item.description:
@slomifier wrote:

go onto your server, die, find the coords of the respawn, search from them in your client.java (or if your using a more advanced server, search the death handler) and change it to what you want. Once you find them, do something like:

teleporttox=telex
teleporttoy=teley

and state tele x and y somewhere easy to find, to make it easier to change.

Read full topic

item.title: Help to change a place
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

client.java, search for the coords of the place.

or if you have commands to get there search something like

“home”

Read full topic
